QuestData.Title: Beseeching Bwonsamdi
QuestData.Description:
We must talk to Torga's spirit and find out what exactly happened here... and how we can stop it.
Hrm, you mentioned dat you are linked to Bwonsamdi now.
It is time to test dat link. We need Bwonsamdi to get us Torga's spirit.
QuestData.LogDescription: Summon Bwonsamdi to ask for his help.
